snippet: A day after a 20-player brawl disrupted practice, Coach Rex Ryan made the team run to exhaustion to make the point that he wants the infighting to stop.
abstract: New York Jets coach Rex Ryan makes his players run an extra 1,067 yards of sprints during training camp, making the point that he wants the infighting to stop; comes a day after a 20-player brawl disrupted practice.
lead_paragraph: A day after a 20-player brawl disrupted practice, Coach Rex Ryan made the team run to exhaustion to make the point that he wants the infighting to stop.

headline.seo: Another Jets’ Dust-Up Is Too Much for Ryan
headline.main: Another Jets Dust-Up Is One Too Many for Ryan
headline.print_headline: Another Jets Dust-Up Is One Too Many for Ryan
